title: Sou Servant
description: Throw that old binder away, Sou servant allow admin users with the ability to add, edit, and delete items. In buiilding this web-based application, I displayed a working knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.JS, Node.JS, MongoDB, JWT, and RESTful methods to develop frontend design, client-side validations, and the API framework.
